import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./Content.css"; import { Tab, Tabs, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import axios from 'axios'; class UserManagement extends Component{ state = { users:[] }; componentDidMount(){ axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:5000/users') .then(res => { JSON.parse(res.data) this.setState({users:res.data}); console.log({users:res.data}) }) .catch((err) =>{ console.log("There is an error in API call.", err) }) } render(){ return( <>

User Management

{this.state.users.map(item =>( ))}

) } } export default UserManagement;
